LoanApplication.title: Loan Application
LoanApplication.description: Represents a loan application submitted by a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who submitted the application.

fullName.description: The full name of the applicant.

email.description: The email address of the applicant.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the applicant.

passportPhotoUrl.description: URL of the uploaded passport photograph.

idUrl.description: URL of the uploaded NIN or valid ID.

loanAmount.description: The amount requested for the loan.

loanDuration.description: The duration of the loan in months.

submissionDate.description: Date and time the application was submitted.

status.description: The current status of the application.

guarantorRelationship.description: Relationship of the guarantor to the borrower.

Customer.title: Customer
Customer.description: Represents a customer or borrower in the system.

name.description: The full name of the customer.

email.description: The email address of the customer.

phone.description: The phone number of the customer.

bvn.description: The Bank Verification Number of the customer.

createdAt.description: The date the customer was created.

Loan.title: Loan
Loan.description: Represents a loan record for a customer.

borrowerId.description: The ID of the customer who borrowed the loan.

loanAmount.description: The principal amount of the loan.

interestRate.description: The flat interest rate for the loan.

duration.description: The duration of the loan in months.

totalRepayment.description: Total amount to be repaid (principal + interest).

amountPaid.description: The total amount paid so far.

outstandingBalance.description: The remaining balance to be paid.

disbursedAt.description: Timestamp when the loan was marked as disbursed.

applicationId.description: The ID of the original loan application.

InvestmentApplication.title: Investment Application
InvestmentApplication.description: Represents an investment application submitted by a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user submitting the application.

/loanApplications/{loanApplicationId}.description: Stores all loan applications submitted through the public form.

/investmentApplications/{investmentId}.description: Stores all investment applications from users.

/Loans/{loanId}.description: Stores all loan records for customers.
